title: Set alias for columns in data set but in expression builder still shows the old column names when selecting the dataset
OB: When selecting the dataset in the expression builder and double clicking the first column name, the original name of the column is displayed below the expression builder instead of the alias name specified for the column.
EB: According to SCR 78193 in the tracker, the first column in the expression builder should use the alias name instead of the original name. Therefore, when double clicking the original name, the alias name should appear as row["column1"] above the expression builder.
SR:
1. Open the expression builder.
2. Select the dataset.
3. Double click the first column name.
4. Verify that the original name of the column is displayed below the expression builder and the alias name appears as row["column1"] above the expression builder.
